definition: a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: Take a walk through the park on Zhongshan Road.
Walking home by the alma mater is just for seeking fun.
sentences.chinese: 经过母校步行回家仅仅为了取乐而已。

sentences.english: Metro line 2 to century avenue Station, about 10 min walk to the hostel.
sentences.chinese: 坐地铁2号线世纪大道站下，步行10分钟到旅舍。

sentences.english: The script refers to this single-man walker as a modified scout walker.
sentences.chinese: 剧本称这种单人步行机为改造过的探察步行机。

sentences.english: The script refers to this single-man walker as a modified scout walker.
sentences.chinese: 剧本称这种单人步行机为改造过的探察步行机。

sentences.english: We had to abandon the car and walk the rest of the way.
sentences.chinese: 我们只好弃车，步行赶剩下的路。

sentences.english: Crosswalks even got a fresh coat of paint to encourage walking and biking.
sentences.chinese: 过街天桥上都挂上鼓励步行和骑车的条幅。

sentences.english: We walked far into the woods.
I'll walk, trot , canter or gallop to be near you.
sentences.chinese: 我会步行，小跑，慢跑或驰骋在靠近你。

sentences.english: On wheels or on foot, everyone was rushing.
sentences.chinese: 不管坐车还是步行，人人都来去匆匆。

sentences.english: Sometimes I go to educate by bike and at whiles on foot.
sentences.chinese: 我有时骑自行车上学，有时步行去。

sentences.english: I still had to continue my uphill walk after taking the pictures to find the bus stop to take me back to Tsuen Wan.
sentences.chinese: 其后还要继续步行到下一个巴士站才乘巴士回到荃湾。

sentences.english: It takes her twenty minutes to walk to school every day.
sentences.chinese: 她每天步行去上学要花二十分钟的时间。

sentences.english: Most of her jerky, almost spasmodic except her walk.
sentences.chinese: 大多数她干，她几乎痉挛除步行。

sentences.english: Hike a mile with a backpack full of cold fried chicken and biscuits.
sentences.chinese: 背一大包油煎鸡块和饼干步行一英里。

definition: to take the car, bus, train etc
to get off or out of (a bus, train, car etc)
to ride (in a car or carriage)/to drive/to motor
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
travel time/expected time for a car journey
to change train (plane, bus etc)/transfer between modes of transport
to ride as a passenger/to travel by (car, plane etc)
